We also ask that you complete our questionnaire so our pharmacy team can check that this product is suitable for you to buy. [](javascript:scrollToTop();) Milk thistle Minimise the after-effects of overindulgence with milk thistle tablets, a herbal medicinal product used to relieve the symptoms associated with excessive food and drink. This traditional remedy for [indigestion](https://www.boots.com/wellness/vitaminsandsupplements/digestive-health) and an upset stomach can also be taken as maximum strength milk thistle capsules for ultimate relief.
